   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%% Common Test Framework callback module.
   22: %%%
   23: %%% This module exports framework callback functions which are
   24: %%% called from the test_server.
   25: 
   26: -module(ct_framework).
   27: -moduledoc false.
   28: 
   29: -export([init_tc/3, end_tc/3, end_tc/4, get_suite/2, get_all_cases/1]).
   30: -export([report/2, warn/1, error_notification/4]).
   31: 
   32: -export([get_log_dir/0, get_logopts/0, format_comment/1, get_html_wrapper/4]).
   33: 
   34: -export([error_in_suite/1, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   35: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
   36: 
   37: -include("ct.hrl").
   38: -include("ct_event.hrl").
   39: -include("ct_util.hrl").
   40: 
   41: -define(val(Key, List), proplists:get_value(Key, List)). 
   42: -define(val(Key, List, Def), proplists:get_value(Key, List, Def)).
   43: -define(rev(L), lists:reverse(L)).
   44: 
   45: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   46: %%% -spec init_tc(Mod,Func,Args) -> {ok,NewArgs} | {error,Reason} |
   47: %%%         {skip,Reason} | {auto_skip,Reason}
   48: %%%      Mod = atom()
   49: %%%      Func = atom()
   50: %%%      Args = list()
   51: %%%      NewArgs = list()
   52: %%%      Reason = term()
   53: %%%
   54: %%% Test server framework callback, called by the test_server
   55: %%% when a new test case is started.
   56: init_tc(_,{end_per_testcase_not_run,_},[Config]) ->
   57:     %% Testcase is completed (skipped or failed), but end_per_testcase
   58:     %% is not run - don't call pre-hook.
   59:     {ok,[Config]};
   60: init_tc(Mod,EPTC={end_per_testcase,_},[Config]) ->
   61:     %% in case Mod == ct_framework, lookup the suite name
   62:     Suite = get_suite_name(Mod, Config),
   63:     case ct_hooks:init_tc(Suite,EPTC,Config) of
   64: 	NewConfig when is_list(NewConfig) ->
   65: 	    {ok,[NewConfig]};
   66: 	Other->
   67: 	    Other
   68:     end;
   69: 
   70: init_tc(Mod,Func0,Args) ->
   71:     %% in case Mod == ct_framework, lookup the suite name
   72:     Suite = get_suite_name(Mod, Args),
   73:     {Func,HookFunc} = case Func0 of
   74: 			  {init_per_testcase,F} -> {F,Func0};
   75: 			  _                     -> {Func0,Func0}
   76: 		      end,
   77: 
   78:     %% check if previous testcase was interpreted and has left
   79:     %% a "dead" trace window behind - if so, kill it
   80:     case ct_util:get_testdata(interpret) of
   81: 	{What,kill,{TCPid,AttPid}} ->
   82: 	    ct_util:kill_attached(TCPid,AttPid),
   83: 	    ct_util:set_testdata({interpret,{What,kill,{undefined,undefined}}});
   84: 	_ ->
   85: 	    ok
   86:     end,
   87: 
   88:     case Func=/=end_per_suite
   89: 	andalso Func=/=end_per_group
   90: 	andalso ct_util:get_testdata(skip_rest) of
   91: 	true ->
   92:             initialize(false,Mod,Func,Args),
   93: 	    {auto_skip,"Repeated test stopped by force_stop option"};
   94: 	_ ->
   95: 	    case ct_util:get_testdata(curr_tc) of
   96: 		{Suite,{suite0_failed,{require,Reason}}} ->
   97:                     initialize(false,Mod,Func,Args),
   98: 		    {auto_skip,{require_failed_in_suite0,Reason}};
   99: 		{Suite,{suite0_failed,_}=Failure} ->
  100:                     initialize(false,Mod,Func,Args),
  101: 		    {fail,Failure};
  102: 		_ ->
  103: 		    ct_util:update_testdata(curr_tc,
  104: 					    fun(undefined) ->
  105: 						    [{Suite,Func}];
  106: 					       (Running) ->
  107: 						    [{Suite,Func}|Running]
  108: 					    end, [create]),
  109: 		    case ct_util:read_suite_data({seq,Suite,Func}) of
  110: 			undefined ->
  111: 			    init_tc1(Mod,Suite,Func,HookFunc,Args);
  112: 			Seq when is_atom(Seq) ->
  113: 			    case ct_util:read_suite_data({seq,Suite,Seq}) of
  114: 				[Func|TCs] -> % this is the 1st case in Seq
  115: 				    %% make sure no cases in this seq are
  116: 				    %% marked as failed from an earlier execution
  117: 				    %% in the same suite
  118: 				    lists:foreach(
  119: 				      fun(TC) ->
  120: 					      ct_util:save_suite_data(
  121: 						{seq,Suite,TC},
  122: 						Seq)
  123: 				      end, TCs);
  124: 				_ ->
  125: 				    ok
  126: 			    end,
  127: 			    init_tc1(Mod,Suite,Func,HookFunc,Args);
  128: 			{failed,Seq,BadFunc} ->
  129:                             initialize(false,Mod,Func,Args),
  130:                             {auto_skip,{sequence_failed,Seq,BadFunc}}
  131: 		    end
  132: 	    end
  133:     end.
  134: 
  135: init_tc1(?MODULE,_,error_in_suite,_,[Config0]) when is_list(Config0) ->
  136:     initialize(false,?MODULE,error_in_suite),
  137:     _ = ct_suite_init(?MODULE,error_in_suite,[],Config0),
  138:     case ?val(error,Config0) of
  139: 	undefined ->
  140: 	    {fail,"unknown_error_in_suite"};
  141: 	Reason ->
  142: 	    {fail,Reason}
  143:     end;
  144: 
  145: init_tc1(Mod,Suite,Func,HookFunc,[Config0]) when is_list(Config0) ->
  146:     Config1 = 
  147: 	case ct_util:read_suite_data(last_saved_config) of
  148: 	    {{Suite,LastFunc},SavedConfig} ->	% last testcase
  149: 		[{saved_config,{LastFunc,SavedConfig}} | 
  150: 		 lists:keydelete(saved_config,1,Config0)];
  151: 	    {{LastSuite,InitOrEnd},
  152: 	     SavedConfig} when InitOrEnd == init_per_suite ;
  153: 			       InitOrEnd == end_per_suite ->
  154: 		%% last suite
  155: 		[{saved_config,{LastSuite,SavedConfig}} | 
  156: 		 lists:keydelete(saved_config,1,Config0)];
  157: 	    undefined ->
  158: 		lists:keydelete(saved_config,1,Config0)
  159: 	end,
  160:     ct_util:delete_suite_data(last_saved_config),
  161:     Config = lists:keydelete(watchdog,1,Config1),
  162: 
  163:     if Func == init_per_suite ->
  164: 	    %% delete all default values used in previous suite
  165: 	    ct_config:delete_default_config(suite),
  166: 	    %% release all name -> key bindings (once per suite)
  167: 	    ct_config:release_allocated();
  168:        Func /= init_per_suite ->
  169: 	    ok
  170:     end,
  171: 
  172:     GroupPath = ?val(tc_group_path, Config, []),
  173:     AllGroups =	[?val(tc_group_properties, Config, []) | GroupPath],
  174: 
  175:     %% clear all config data default values set by previous
  176:     %% testcase info function (these should only survive the
  177:     %% testcase, not the whole suite)
  178:     FuncSpec = group_or_func(Func,Config0),
  179:     HookFunc1 =
  180: 	if is_tuple(FuncSpec) ->		% group
  181: 	    FuncSpec;
  182: 	   true ->
  183: 		ct_config:delete_default_config(testcase),
  184: 		HookFunc
  185: 	end,
  186:     case add_defaults(Mod,Func,AllGroups) of
  187: 	Error = {suite0_failed,_} ->
  188: 	    initialize(false,Mod,FuncSpec),
  189: 	    ct_util:set_testdata({curr_tc,{Suite,Error}}),
  190: 	    {error,Error};
  191: 	Error = {group0_failed,_} ->
  192: 	    initialize(false,Mod,FuncSpec),
  193: 	    {auto_skip,Error};
  194: 	Error = {testcase0_failed,_} ->
  195: 	    initialize(false,Mod,FuncSpec),
  196: 	    {auto_skip,Error};
  197: 	{SuiteInfo,MergeResult} ->
  198: 	    case MergeResult of
  199: 		{error,Reason} ->
  200: 		    initialize(false,Mod,FuncSpec),
  201: 		    {fail,Reason};
  202: 		_ ->
  203: 		    init_tc2(Mod,Suite,Func,HookFunc1,
  204: 			     SuiteInfo,MergeResult,Config)
  205: 	    end
  206:     end;
  207: 
  208: init_tc1(_Mod,_Suite,_Func,_HookFunc,Args) ->
  209:     {ok,Args}.
  210: 
  211: init_tc2(Mod,Suite,Func,HookFunc,SuiteInfo,MergeResult,Config) ->
  212:     %% timetrap must be handled before require
  213:     MergedInfo = timetrap_first(MergeResult, [], []),
  214:     %% tell logger to use specified style sheet
  215:     _ = case lists:keysearch(stylesheet,1,MergeResult++Config) of
  216: 	{value,{stylesheet,SSFile}} ->
  217: 	    ct_logs:set_stylesheet(Func,add_data_dir(SSFile,Config));
  218: 	_ ->
  219: 	    case ct_util:get_testdata(stylesheet) of
  220: 		undefined ->
  221: 		    ct_logs:clear_stylesheet(Func);
  222: 		SSFile ->
  223: 		    ct_logs:set_stylesheet(Func,SSFile)
  224: 	    end
  225:     end,
  226:     %% suppress output for connections (Conns is a 
  227:     %% list of {Type,Bool} tuples, e.g. {telnet,true}),		
  228:     case ct_util:get_overridden_silenced_connections() of
  229: 	undefined ->
  230: 	    case lists:keysearch(silent_connections,1,MergeResult++Config) of
  231: 		{value,{silent_connections,Conns}} ->
  232: 		    ct_util:silence_connections(Conns);
  233: 		_ ->
  234: 		    ok
  235: 	    end;
  236: 	Conns ->
  237: 	    ct_util:silence_connections(Conns)
  238:     end,
  239:     FuncSpec = group_or_func(Func,Config),
  240:     initialize((Func==init_per_suite),Mod,FuncSpec),
  241: 
  242:     case catch configure(MergedInfo,MergedInfo,SuiteInfo,
  243: 			 FuncSpec,[],Config) of
  244: 	{suite0_failed,Reason} ->
  245: 	    ct_util:set_testdata({curr_tc,{Mod,{suite0_failed,
  246: 						{require,Reason}}}}),
  247: 	    {auto_skip,{require_failed_in_suite0,Reason}};
  248: 	{error,Reason} ->
  249: 	    {auto_skip,{require_failed,Reason}};
  250: 	{'EXIT',Reason} ->
  251: 	    {fail,Reason};
  252: 	{ok,PostInitHook,Config1} ->
  253: 	    case get('$test_server_framework_test') of
  254: 		undefined ->
  255: 		    ct_suite_init(Suite,HookFunc,PostInitHook,Config1);
  256: 		Fun ->
  257: 		    PostInitHookResult = do_post_init_hook(PostInitHook,
  258: 							   Config1),
  259: 		    case Fun(init_tc, [PostInitHookResult ++ Config1]) of
  260: 			NewConfig when is_list(NewConfig) ->
  261: 			    {ok,NewConfig};
  262: 			Else ->
  263: 			    Else
  264: 		    end
  265: 	    end
  266:     end.
  267: 
  268: initialize(RefreshLogs,Mod,Func,[Config]) when is_list(Config) ->
  269:     initialize(RefreshLogs,Mod,group_or_func(Func,Config));
  270: initialize(RefreshLogs,Mod,Func,_) ->
  271:     initialize(RefreshLogs,Mod,Func).
  272: 
  273: initialize(RefreshLogs,Mod,FuncSpec) ->
  274:     ct_logs:init_tc(RefreshLogs),
  275:     ct_event:notify(#event{name=tc_start,
  276: 			   node=node(),
  277: 			   data={Mod,FuncSpec}}).
  278: 
  279: 
  280: ct_suite_init(Suite,HookFunc,PostInitHook,Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  281:     case ct_hooks:init_tc(Suite,HookFunc,Config) of
  282: 	NewConfig when is_list(NewConfig) ->
  283: 	    PostInitHookResult = do_post_init_hook(PostInitHook,NewConfig),
  284: 	    {ok, [PostInitHookResult ++ NewConfig]};
  285: 	Else ->
  286: 	    Else
  287:     end.
  288: 
  289: do_post_init_hook(PostInitHook,Config) ->
  290:     lists:flatmap(fun({Tag,Fun}) ->
  291: 			  case lists:keysearch(Tag,1,Config) of
  292: 			      {value,_} ->
  293: 				  [];
  294: 			      false -> 
  295: 				  case Fun() of
  296: 				      {error,_} -> [];
  297: 				      Result    -> [{Tag,Result}]
  298: 				  end
  299: 			  end
  300: 		  end, PostInitHook).
  301: 
  302: add_defaults(Mod,Func, GroupPath) ->
  303:     Suite = get_suite_name(Mod, GroupPath),
  304:     case (catch Suite:suite()) of
  305: 	{'EXIT',{undef,_}} ->
  306: 	    SuiteInfo = merge_with_suite_defaults(Suite,[]),
  307: 	    SuiteInfoNoCTH = [I || I <- SuiteInfo, element(1,I) =/= ct_hooks],
  308: 	    case add_defaults1(Mod,Func, GroupPath, SuiteInfoNoCTH) of
  309: 		Error = {group0_failed,_} -> Error;
  310: 		Error = {testcase0_failed,_} -> Error;
  311: 		Error = {error,_} -> {SuiteInfo,Error};
  312: 		MergedInfo -> {SuiteInfo,MergedInfo}
  313: 	    end;
  314: 	{'EXIT',Reason} ->
  315: 	    ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
  316: 				   "~w:suite/0 failed: ~tp~n",
  317: 				   [Suite,Reason]),
  318: 	    io:format("~ts", [ErrStr]),
  319: 	    io:format(?def_gl, "~ts", [ErrStr]),
  320: 	    {suite0_failed,{exited,Reason}};
  321: 	SuiteInfo when is_list(SuiteInfo) ->
  322: 	    case lists:all(fun(E) when is_tuple(E) -> true;
  323: 			      (_) -> false
  324: 			   end, SuiteInfo) of
  325: 		true ->
  326: 		    SuiteInfo1 = merge_with_suite_defaults(Suite, SuiteInfo),
  327: 		    SuiteInfoNoCTH = [I || I <- SuiteInfo1,
  328: 					   element(1,I) =/= ct_hooks],
  329: 		    case add_defaults1(Mod,Func, GroupPath,
  330: 				       SuiteInfoNoCTH) of
  331: 			Error = {group0_failed,_} -> Error;
  332: 			Error = {testcase0_failed,_} -> Error;
  333: 			Error = {error,_} -> {SuiteInfo1,Error};
  334: 			MergedInfo -> {SuiteInfo1,MergedInfo}
  335: 		    end;
  336: 		false ->
  337: 		    ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
  338: 					   "Invalid return value from "
  339: 					   "~w:suite/0: ~tp~n",
  340: 					   [Suite,SuiteInfo]),
  341: 		    io:format("~ts", [ErrStr]),
  342: 		    io:format(?def_gl, "~ts", [ErrStr]),
  343: 		    {suite0_failed,bad_return_value}
  344: 	    end;
  345: 	SuiteInfo ->
  346: 	    ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
  347: 				   "Invalid return value from "
  348: 				   "~w:suite/0: ~tp~n", [Suite,SuiteInfo]),
  349: 	    io:format("~ts", [ErrStr]),
  350: 	    io:format(?def_gl, "~ts", [ErrStr]),
  351: 	    {suite0_failed,bad_return_value}
  352:     end.
  353: 
  354: add_defaults1(Mod,Func, GroupPath, SuiteInfo) ->
  355:     Suite = get_suite_name(Mod, GroupPath),
  356:     %% GroupPathInfo (for subgroup on level X) =
  357:     %%     [LevelXGroupInfo, LevelX-1GroupInfo, ..., TopLevelGroupInfo]
  358:     GroupPathInfo =  
  359: 	lists:map(fun(GroupProps) ->
  360: 			  case ?val(name, GroupProps) of
  361: 			      undefined ->
  362: 				  [];
  363: 			      Name ->
  364: 				  case catch Suite:group(Name) of
  365: 				      GrInfo when is_list(GrInfo) -> GrInfo;
  366: 				      {'EXIT',{undef,_}} -> [];
  367: 				      BadGr0 -> {error,BadGr0,Name}
  368: 				  end
  369: 			  end
  370: 		  end, GroupPath),
  371:     case lists:keysearch(error, 1, GroupPathInfo) of
  372: 	{value,{error,BadGr0Val,GrName}} ->
  373: 	    Gr0ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
  374: 				      "Invalid return value from "
  375: 				      "~w:group(~tw): ~tp~n",
  376: 				      [Mod,GrName,BadGr0Val]),
  377: 	    io:format("~ts", [Gr0ErrStr]),
  378: 	    io:format(?def_gl, "~ts", [Gr0ErrStr]),
  379: 	    {group0_failed,bad_return_value};
  380: 	_ ->
  381: 	    Args = if Func == init_per_group ; Func == end_per_group ->
  382: 			   [?val(name, hd(GroupPath))];
  383: 		      true ->
  384: 			   []
  385: 		   end,
  386: 	    TestCaseInfo =
  387: 		case catch apply(Mod,Func,Args) of
  388: 		    TCInfo when is_list(TCInfo) -> TCInfo;
  389: 		    {'EXIT',{undef,_}} -> [];
  390: 		    BadTC0 -> {error,BadTC0}
  391: 		end,
  392: 	    
  393: 	    case TestCaseInfo of
  394: 		{error,BadTC0Val} ->
  395: 		    TC0ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
  396: 					      "Invalid return value from "
  397: 					      "~w:~tw/0: ~tp~n",
  398: 					      [Mod,Func,BadTC0Val]),
  399: 		    io:format("~ts", [TC0ErrStr]),
  400: 		    io:format(?def_gl, "~ts", [TC0ErrStr]),
  401: 		    {testcase0_failed,bad_return_value};
  402: 		_ ->
  403: 		    %% let test case info (also for all config funcs) override
  404: 		    %% group info, and lower level group info override higher
  405: 		    %% level info
  406: 		    TCAndGroupInfo =
  407: 			[TestCaseInfo | remove_info_in_prev(TestCaseInfo,
  408: 							    GroupPathInfo)],
  409: 		    %% find and save require terms found in suite info
  410: 		    SuiteReqs = 
  411: 			[SDDef || SDDef <- SuiteInfo,
  412: 				  ((require == element(1,SDDef))
  413: 				   or (default_config == element(1,SDDef)))],
  414: 		    case check_for_clashes(TestCaseInfo, GroupPathInfo,
  415: 					   SuiteReqs) of
  416: 			[] ->
  417: 			    add_defaults2(Mod,Func, TCAndGroupInfo,
  418: 					  SuiteInfo,SuiteReqs);
  419: 			Clashes ->
  420: 			    {error,{config_name_already_in_use,Clashes}}
  421: 		    end
  422: 	    end
  423:     end.
  424: 
  425: get_suite_name(?MODULE, [Cfg|_]) when is_list(Cfg), Cfg /= [] ->
  426:     get_suite_name(?MODULE, Cfg);
  427: 
  428: get_suite_name(?MODULE, Cfg) when is_list(Cfg), Cfg /= [] ->
  429:     case ?val(tc_group_properties, Cfg) of
  430: 	undefined ->
  431: 	    case ?val(suite, Cfg) of
  432: 		undefined -> ?MODULE;
  433: 		Suite -> Suite
  434: 	    end;
  435: 	GrProps ->
  436: 	    case ?val(suite, GrProps) of
  437: 		undefined -> ?MODULE;
  438: 		Suite -> Suite
  439: 	    end
  440:     end;
  441: get_suite_name(Mod, _) ->
  442:     Mod.
  443: 
  444: %% Check that alias names are not already in use
  445: check_for_clashes(TCInfo, [CurrGrInfo|Path], SuiteInfo) ->
  446:     ReqNames = fun(Info) -> [element(2,R) || R <- Info,
  447:                                              tuple_size(R) == 3,
  448: 					     require == element(1,R)]
  449: 	       end,
  450:     ExistingNames = lists:flatten([ReqNames(L)  || L <- [SuiteInfo|Path]]),
  451:     CurrGrReqNs = ReqNames(CurrGrInfo),
  452:     GrClashes = [Name || Name <- CurrGrReqNs,
  453: 			 true == lists:member(Name, ExistingNames)],
  454:     AllReqNs = CurrGrReqNs ++ ExistingNames,
  455:     TCClashes = [Name || Name <- ReqNames(TCInfo),
  456: 			 true == lists:member(Name, AllReqNs)],
  457:     TCClashes ++ GrClashes.
  458: 
  459: %% Delete the info terms in Terms from all following info lists
  460: remove_info_in_prev(Terms, [[] | Rest]) ->
  461:     [[] | remove_info_in_prev(Terms, Rest)];
  462: remove_info_in_prev(Terms, [Info | Rest]) ->
  463:     UniqueInInfo = [U || U <- Info,
  464: 			  ((timetrap == element(1,U)) and
  465: 			   (not lists:keymember(timetrap,1,Terms))) or 
  466: 			  ((require == element(1,U)) and
  467: 			   (not lists:member(U,Terms))) or
  468: 			  ((default_config == element(1,U)) and
  469:                            (not keysmember([default_config,1,
  470: 					    element(2,U),2], Terms)))],
  471:     OtherTermsInInfo = [T || T <- Info,
  472: 			     timetrap /= element(1,T),
  473: 			     require /= element(1,T),
  474: 			     default_config /= element(1,T),
  475: 			     false == lists:keymember(element(1,T),1,
  476: 						      Terms)],
  477:     KeptInfo = UniqueInInfo ++ OtherTermsInInfo,
  478:     [KeptInfo | remove_info_in_prev(Terms ++ KeptInfo, Rest)];
  479: remove_info_in_prev(_, []) ->
  480:     [].
  481: 
  482: keysmember([Key,Pos|Next], List) ->
  483:     case [Elem || Elem <- List, Key == element(Pos,Elem)] of
  484: 	[]    -> false;
  485: 	Found -> keysmember(Next, Found)
  486:     end;
  487: keysmember([], _) -> true.
  488: 
  489: 
  490: add_defaults2(_Mod,init_per_suite, IPSInfo, SuiteInfo,SuiteReqs) ->
  491:     Info = lists:flatten([IPSInfo, SuiteReqs]),
  492:     lists:flatten([Info,remove_info_in_prev(Info, [SuiteInfo])]);
  493: 
  494: add_defaults2(_Mod,init_per_group, IPGAndGroupInfo, SuiteInfo,SuiteReqs) ->
  495:     SuiteInfo1 =
  496: 	remove_info_in_prev(lists:flatten([IPGAndGroupInfo,
  497: 					   SuiteReqs]), [SuiteInfo]),
  498:     %% don't require terms in prev groups (already processed)
  499:     case IPGAndGroupInfo of
  500: 	[IPGInfo] ->
  501: 	    lists:flatten([IPGInfo,SuiteInfo1]);
  502: 	[IPGInfo | [CurrGroupInfo | PrevGroupInfo]] ->
  503: 	    PrevGroupInfo1 = delete_require_terms(PrevGroupInfo),
  504: 	    lists:flatten([IPGInfo,CurrGroupInfo,PrevGroupInfo1,
  505: 			   SuiteInfo1])
  506:     end;
  507: 
  508: add_defaults2(_Mod,_Func, TCAndGroupInfo, SuiteInfo,SuiteReqs) ->
  509:     %% Include require elements from test case info and current group,
  510:     %% but not from previous groups or suite/0 (since we've already required
  511:     %% those vars). Let test case info elements override group and suite
  512:     %% info elements.
  513:     SuiteInfo1 = remove_info_in_prev(lists:flatten([TCAndGroupInfo,
  514: 						    SuiteReqs]), [SuiteInfo]),
  515:     %% don't require terms in prev groups (already processed)
  516:     case TCAndGroupInfo of
  517: 	[TCInfo] ->
  518: 	    lists:flatten([TCInfo,SuiteInfo1]);
  519: 	[TCInfo | [CurrGroupInfo | PrevGroupInfo]] ->
  520: 	    PrevGroupInfo1 = delete_require_terms(PrevGroupInfo),
  521: 	    lists:flatten([TCInfo,CurrGroupInfo,PrevGroupInfo1,
  522: 			   SuiteInfo1])
  523:     end.
  524: 
  525: delete_require_terms([Info | Prev]) ->
  526:     Info1 = [T || T <- Info, 
  527: 		  require /= element(1,T),
  528: 		  default_config /= element(1,T)],
  529:     [Info1 | delete_require_terms(Prev)];
  530: delete_require_terms([]) ->
  531:     [].
  532: 
  533: merge_with_suite_defaults(Mod,SuiteInfo) ->
  534:     case lists:keysearch(suite_defaults,1,Mod:module_info(attributes)) of
  535: 	{value,{suite_defaults,Defaults}} ->
  536: 	    SDReqs =
  537: 		[SDDef || SDDef <- Defaults,
  538: 			  require == element(1,SDDef),
  539: 			  false == lists:keymember(element(2,SDDef),2,
  540: 						   SuiteInfo)],
  541: 	    SuiteInfo ++ SDReqs ++
  542: 		[SDDef || SDDef <- Defaults,
  543: 			  require /= element(1,SDDef),
  544: 			  false == lists:keymember(element(1,SDDef),1,
  545: 						   SuiteInfo)];		    
  546: 	false ->
  547: 	    SuiteInfo
  548:     end.
  549: 
  550: timetrap_first([Trap = {timetrap,_} | Rest],Info,Found) ->
  551:     timetrap_first(Rest,Info,[Trap | Found]);
  552: timetrap_first([Other | Rest],Info,Found) ->
  553:     timetrap_first(Rest,[Other | Info],Found);
  554: timetrap_first([],Info,[]) ->
  555:     [{timetrap,{minutes,30}} | ?rev(Info)];
  556: timetrap_first([],Info,Found) ->
  557:     ?rev(Found) ++ ?rev(Info).
  558: 
  559: configure([{require,Required}|Rest],
  560: 	  Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  561:     case ct:require(Required) of
  562: 	ok ->
  563: 	    configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config);
  564: 	Error = {error,Reason} ->
  565: 	    case required_default('_UNDEF',Required,Info,
  566: 				  SuiteInfo,Scope) of
  567: 		ok ->
  568: 		    configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config);
  569: 		_ ->
  570: 		    case lists:keymember(Required,2,SuiteInfo) of
  571: 			true ->
  572: 			    {suite0_failed,Reason};
  573: 			false ->
  574: 			    Error
  575: 		    end
  576: 	    end
  577:     end;
  578: configure([{require,Name,Required}|Rest],
  579: 	  Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  580:     case ct:require(Name,Required) of
  581: 	ok ->
  582: 	    configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config);
  583: 	Error = {error,Reason} ->
  584: 	    case required_default(Name,Required,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope) of
  585: 		ok ->
  586: 		    configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config);
  587: 		_ ->
  588: 		    case lists:keymember(Name,2,SuiteInfo) of
  589: 			true -> 
  590: 			    {suite0_failed,Reason};
  591: 			false ->
  592: 			    Error
  593: 		    end
  594: 	    end
  595:     end;
  596: configure([{timetrap,off}|Rest],Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  597:     configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config);
  598: configure([{timetrap,Time}|Rest],Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  599:     PostInitHook1 = 
  600: 	[{watchdog,fun() -> case test_server:get_timetrap_info() of
  601: 				undefined ->
  602: 				    test_server:timetrap(Time);
  603: 				_ ->
  604: 				    {error,already_set}
  605: 			    end
  606: 		   end} | PostInitHook],
  607:     configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook1,Config);
  608: configure([{ct_hooks,Hook}|Rest],Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  609:     configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,[{ct_hooks,Hook}|Config]);
  610: configure([{ct_hooks_order,Order}|Rest],Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  611:     configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,[{ct_hooks_order,Order}|Config]);
  612: configure([_|Rest],Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  613:     configure(Rest,Info,SuiteInfo,Scope,PostInitHook,Config);
  614: configure([],_,_,_,PostInitHook,Config) ->
  615:     {ok,PostInitHook,Config}.
  616: 
  617: %% the require element in Info may come from suite/0 and
  618: %% should be scoped 'suite', or come from the group info
  619: %% function and be scoped 'group', or come from the testcase
  620: %% info function and then be scoped 'testcase'
  621: 
  622: required_default(Name,Key,Info,_,init_per_suite) ->
  623:     try_set_default(Name,Key,Info,suite);
  624: required_default(Name,Key,Info,_,{init_per_group,GrName,_}) ->
  625:     try_set_default(Name,Key,Info,{group,GrName});
  626: required_default(Name,Key,Info,_,_FuncSpec) ->
  627:     try_set_default(Name,Key,Info,testcase).
  628: 
  629: try_set_default(Name,Key,Info,Where) ->
  630:     CfgElems = 
  631: 	case lists:keysearch(Name,1,Info) of
  632: 	    {value,{Name,Val}} ->
  633: 		[Val];
  634: 	    false ->
  635: 		case catch [{Key,element(3,Elem)} || Elem <- Info,
  636: 						     element(1,Elem)==default_config,
  637: 						     element(2,Elem)==Key] of
  638: 		    {'EXIT',_} -> [];
  639: 		    Result -> Result
  640: 		end
  641: 	end,
  642:     case {Name,CfgElems} of
  643: 	{_,[]} -> 
  644: 	    no_default;
  645: 	{'_UNDEF',_} ->
  646: 	    _ = [ct_config:set_default_config([CfgVal],Where) || CfgVal <- CfgElems],
  647: 	    ok;
  648: 	_ ->
  649: 	    _ = [ct_config:set_default_config(Name,[CfgVal],Where) || CfgVal <- CfgElems],
  650: 	    ok
  651:     end.
  652: 	    
  653: 
  654: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  655: %%% -spec end_tc(Mod,Func,Args) -> {ok,NewArgs}| {error,Reason} |
  656: %%%         {skip,Reason} | {auto_skip,Reason}
  657: %%%      Mod = atom()
  658: %%%      Func = atom()
  659: %%%      Args = list()
  660: %%%      NewArgs = list()
  661: %%%      Reason = term()
  662: %%%
  663: %%% Test server framework callback, called by the test_server
  664: %%% when a test case is finished.
  665: end_tc(Mod, Fun, Args) ->
  666:     %% Have to keep end_tc/3 for backwards compatibility issues
  667:     end_tc(Mod, Fun, Args, '$end_tc_dummy').
  668: end_tc(?MODULE,error_in_suite,{Result,[Args]},Return) ->
  669:     case proplists:get_value(force_failed, Args) of
  670: 		undefined -> ok;
  671: 		_ -> add_to_stats(failed)
  672:     end,
  673:     %% this clause gets called if CT has encountered a suite that
  674:     %% can't be executed
  675:     FinalNotify =
  676: 	case ct_hooks:end_tc(?MODULE, error_in_suite, Args, Result, Return) of
  677: 	    '$ct_no_change' ->
  678: 		Result;
  679: 	    HookResult ->
  680: 		HookResult
  681: 	end,
  682:     Event = #event{name=tc_done,
  683: 		   node=node(),
  684: 		   data={?MODULE,error_in_suite,tag(FinalNotify)}},
  685:     ct_event:sync_notify(Event),
  686:     ok;
  687: end_tc(Mod,Func,{TCPid,Result,[Args]}, Return) when is_pid(TCPid) ->
  688:     end_tc(Mod,Func,TCPid,Result,Args,Return);
  689: end_tc(Mod,Func,{Result,[Args]}, Return) ->
  690:     end_tc(Mod,Func,self(),Result,Args,Return).
  691: 
  692: end_tc(Mod,IPTC={init_per_testcase,_Func},_TCPid,Result,Args,Return) ->
  693:     case end_hook_func(IPTC,Return,IPTC) of
  694:         undefined -> ok;
  695:         _ ->
  696:             %% in case Mod == ct_framework, lookup the suite name
  697:             Suite = get_suite_name(Mod, Args),
  698:             case ct_hooks:end_tc(Suite,IPTC,Args,Result,Return) of
  699:                 '$ct_no_change' ->
  700:                     ok;
  701:                 HookResult ->
  702:                     HookResult
  703:             end
  704:     end;
  705: 
  706: end_tc(Mod,Func00,TCPid,Result,Args,Return) ->
  707:     %% in case Mod == ct_framework, lookup the suite name
  708:     Suite = get_suite_name(Mod, Args),
  709:     {OnlyCleanup,Func0} =
  710:         case Func00 of
  711:             {cleanup,F0} ->
  712:                 {true,F0};
  713:             _ ->
  714:                 {false,Func00}
  715:         end,
  716:     {Func,FuncSpec,HookFunc} =
  717:         case Func0 of
  718:             {end_per_testcase_not_run,F} ->
  719:                 %% Testcase is completed (skipped or failed), but
  720:                 %% end_per_testcase is not run - don't call post-hook.
  721:                 {F,F,undefined};
  722:             {end_per_testcase,F} ->
  723:                 {F,F,Func0};
  724:             _ ->
  725:                 FS = group_or_func(Func0,Args),
  726:                 HF = end_hook_func(Func0,Return,FS),
  727:                 {Func0,FS,HF}
  728:         end,
  729: 
  730:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(),
  731: 
  732:     %% save the testcase process pid so that it can be used
  733:     %% to look up the attached trace window later
  734:     case ct_util:get_testdata(interpret) of
  735: 	{What,kill,_} ->
  736: 	    AttPid = ct_util:get_attached(self()),
  737: 	    ct_util:set_testdata({interpret,{What,kill,{self(),AttPid}}});
  738: 	_ ->
  739: 	    ok
  740:     end,
  741:     if Func == end_per_group; Func == end_per_suite ->
  742: 	    %% clean up any saved comments
  743: 	    ct_util:match_delete_testdata({comment,'_'});
  744:        true ->
  745: 	    %% attempt to delete any saved comment for this TC
  746: 	    case process_info(TCPid, group_leader) of
  747: 		{group_leader,TCGL} ->
  748: 		    ct_util:delete_testdata({comment,TCGL});
  749: 		_ ->
  750: 		    ok
  751: 	    end
  752:     end,
  753:     ct_util:delete_suite_data(last_saved_config),
  754: 
  755:     {Result1,FinalNotify} =
  756:         case HookFunc of
  757:             undefined ->
  758:                 {ok,Result};
  759:             _ when OnlyCleanup ->
  760:                 {ok,Result};
  761:             _ ->
  762:                 case ct_hooks:end_tc(Suite,HookFunc,Args,Result,Return) of
  763:                     '$ct_no_change' ->
  764:                         {ok,Result};
  765:                     HookResult ->
  766:                         {HookResult,HookResult}
  767:                 end
  768:         end,
  769:     FinalResult =
  770: 	case get('$test_server_framework_test') of
  771:             _ when OnlyCleanup ->
  772:                 Result1;
  773: 	    undefined ->
  774: 		%% send sync notification so that event handlers may print
  775: 		%% in the log file before it gets closed
  776: 		Event = #event{name=tc_done,
  777: 			       node=node(),
  778: 			       data={Mod,FuncSpec,
  779: 				     tag(FinalNotify)}},
  780: 		ct_event:sync_notify(Event),
  781: 		Result1;
  782: 	    Fun ->
  783: 		%% send sync notification so that event handlers may print
  784: 		%% in the log file before it gets closed
  785: 		Event = #event{name=tc_done,
  786: 			       node=node(),
  787: 			       data={Mod,FuncSpec,
  788: 				     tag({'$test_server_framework_test',
  789: 					  FinalNotify})}},
  790: 		ct_event:sync_notify(Event),
  791: 		Fun(end_tc, Return)
  792: 	end,    
  793: 
  794:     case FuncSpec of
  795: 	{_,GroupName,_Props} ->
  796: 	    if Func == end_per_group ->
  797: 		    ct_config:delete_default_config({group,GroupName});
  798: 	       true -> ok
  799: 	    end,
  800: 	    case lists:keysearch(save_config,1,Args) of
  801: 		{value,{save_config,SaveConfig}} ->
  802: 		    ct_util:save_suite_data(last_saved_config,
  803: 					    {Suite,{group,GroupName}},
  804: 					    SaveConfig);
  805: 		false ->
  806: 		    ok
  807: 	    end;
  808: 	_ ->
  809: 	    case lists:keysearch(save_config,1,Args) of
  810: 		{value,{save_config,SaveConfig}} ->
  811: 		    ct_util:save_suite_data(last_saved_config,
  812: 					    {Suite,Func},SaveConfig);
  813: 		false ->
  814: 		    ok
  815: 	    end
  816:     end,
  817: 
  818:     ct_util:reset_silent_connections(),
  819: 
  820:     %% reset the curr_tc state, or delete this TC from the list of
  821:     %% executing cases (if in a parallel group)
  822:     ClearCurrTC = fun(Running = [_,_|_]) ->
  823: 			  lists:keydelete(Func,2,Running);
  824: 		     ({_,{suite0_failed,_}}) ->
  825: 			  undefined;
  826: 		     ([{_,_}]) ->
  827: 			  undefined;
  828: 		     (undefined) ->
  829: 			  undefined;
  830: 		     (Unexpected) ->
  831: 			  {error,{reset_curr_tc,{Mod,Func},Unexpected}}
  832: 		  end,
  833:     case ct_util:update_testdata(curr_tc, ClearCurrTC) of
  834: 	{error,_} = ClearError ->
  835: 	    exit(ClearError);
  836: 	_ ->
  837: 	    ok
  838:     end,
  839: 
  840:     case FinalResult of
  841: 	{auto_skip,{sequence_failed,_,_}} ->
  842: 	    %% ct_logs:init_tc is never called for a skipped test case
  843: 	    %% in a failing sequence, so neither should end_tc	    
  844: 	    ok;
  845: 	_ ->
  846: 	    case ct_logs:end_tc(TCPid) of
  847: 		{error,Reason} ->
  848: 		    exit({error,{logger,Reason}});
  849: 		_ ->
  850: 		    ok
  851: 	    end
  852:     end,
  853:     case Func of
  854: 	end_per_suite -> 
  855: 	    ct_util:match_delete_suite_data({seq,Suite,'_'});
  856: 	_ -> 
  857: 	    ok
  858:     end,
  859:     FinalResult.	    
  860: 
  861: %% This is to make sure that no post_init_per_* is ever called if the
  862: %% corresponding pre_init_per_* was not called.
  863: %% The skip or fail reasons are those that can be returned from
  864: %% init_tc above in situations where we never came to call
  865: %% ct_hooks:init_tc/3, e.g. if suite/0 fails, then we never call
  866: %% ct_hooks:init_tc for init_per_suite, and thus we must not call
  867: %% ct_hooks:end_tc for init_per_suite either.
  868: end_hook_func({init_per_testcase,_},{auto_skip,{sequence_failed,_,_}},_) ->
  869:     undefined;
  870: end_hook_func({init_per_testcase,_},{auto_skip,"Repeated test stopped by force_stop option"},_) ->
  871:     undefined;
  872: end_hook_func({init_per_testcase,_},{fail,{config_name_already_in_use,_}},_) ->
  873:     undefined;
  874: end_hook_func({init_per_testcase,_},{auto_skip,{InfoFuncError,_}},_)
  875:   when InfoFuncError==testcase0_failed;
  876:        InfoFuncError==require_failed ->
  877:     undefined;
  878: end_hook_func(init_per_group,{auto_skip,{InfoFuncError,_}},_)
  879:   when InfoFuncError==group0_failed;
  880:        InfoFuncError==require_failed ->
  881:     undefined;
  882: end_hook_func(init_per_suite,{auto_skip,{require_failed_in_suite0,_}},_) ->
  883:     undefined;
  884: end_hook_func(init_per_suite,{auto_skip,{failed,{error,{suite0_failed,_}}}},_) ->
  885:     undefined;
  886: end_hook_func(_,_,Default) ->
  887:     Default.
  888: 
  889: %% {error,Reason} | {skip,Reason} | {timetrap_timeout,TVal} | 
  890: %% {testcase_aborted,Reason} | testcase_aborted_or_killed | 
  891: %% {'EXIT',Reason} | {fail,Reason} | {failed,Reason} |
  892: %% {user_timetrap_error,Reason} |
  893: %% Other (ignored return value, e.g. 'ok')
  894: tag({'$test_server_framework_test',Result}) ->
  895:     case tag(Result) of
  896: 	ok      -> Result;
  897: 	Failure -> Failure
  898:     end;	    
  899: tag({skipped,Reason={failed,{_,init_per_testcase,_}}}) ->
  900:     {auto_skipped,Reason};
  901: tag({STag,Reason}) when STag == skip; STag == skipped -> 
  902:     case Reason of
  903: 	{failed,{_,init_per_testcase,_}} -> {auto_skipped,Reason};
  904: 	_ -> {skipped,Reason}
  905:     end;
  906: tag({auto_skip,Reason}) ->
  907:     {auto_skipped,Reason};
  908: tag({fail,Reason}) ->
  909:     {failed,{error,Reason}};
  910: tag(Failed = {failed,_Reason}) ->
  911:     Failed;
  912: tag(E = {ETag,_}) when ETag == error; ETag == 'EXIT'; 
  913: 			   ETag == timetrap_timeout;
  914: 			   ETag == testcase_aborted -> 
  915:     {failed,E};
  916: tag(E = testcase_aborted_or_killed) ->
  917:     {failed,E};
  918: tag(UserTimetrap = {user_timetrap_error,_Reason}) ->
  919:     UserTimetrap;
  920: tag(_Other) ->
  921:     ok.
  922: 
  923: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  924: %%% -spec error_notification(Mod,Func,Args,Error) -> ok
  925: %%%      Mod = atom()
  926: %%%      Func = atom()
  927: %%%      Args = list()
  928: %%%      Error = term()
  929: %%%
  930: %%% This function is called as the result of testcase
  931: %%% Func in suite Mod crashing.
  932: %%% Error specifies the reason for failing.
  933: error_notification(Mod,Func,_Args,{Error,Loc}) ->
  934:     ErrorSpec = case Error of
  935: 		 {What={_E,_R},Trace} when is_list(Trace) ->
  936: 		      What;
  937: 		  What ->
  938: 		      What
  939: 	      end,
  940:     ErrorStr = case ErrorSpec of
  941: 		 {badmatch,Descr} ->
  942:                      Descr1 = io_lib:format("~tP",[Descr,10]),
  943:                      DescrLength = string:length(Descr1),
  944:                      if DescrLength > 50 ->
  945: 			     Descr2 = string:slice(Descr1,0,50),
  946: 			     io_lib:format("{badmatch,~ts...}",[Descr2]);
  947: 			true ->
  948: 			     io_lib:format("{badmatch,~ts}",[Descr1])
  949: 		     end;
  950: 		 {test_case_failed,Reason} ->
  951: 		     case (catch io_lib:format("{test_case_failed,~ts}", [Reason])) of
  952: 			 {'EXIT',_} ->
  953: 			     io_lib:format("{test_case_failed,~tp}", [Reason]);
  954: 			 Result -> Result
  955: 		     end;
  956: 		 Other ->
  957: 		     io_lib:format("~tP", [Other,5])
  958: 	     end,
  959:     ErrorHtml =
  960: 	"<font color=\"brown\">" ++ ct_logs:escape_chars(ErrorStr) ++ "</font>",
  961:     case {Mod,Error} of
  962: 	%% some notifications come from the main test_server process
  963: 	%% and for these cases the existing comment may not be modified
  964: 	{_,{timetrap_timeout,_TVal}} ->
  965: 	    ok;
  966: 	{_,{testcase_aborted,_Info}} ->
  967: 	    ok;
  968: 	{_,testcase_aborted_or_killed} ->
  969: 	    ok;
  970: 	{undefined,_OtherError} ->
  971: 	    ok;
  972: 	_ ->			     
  973: 	    %% this notification comes from the test case process, so
  974: 	    %% we can add error info to comment with test_server:comment/1
  975: 	    case ct_util:get_testdata({comment,group_leader()}) of
  976: 		undefined ->
  977: 		    test_server:comment(ErrorHtml);
  978: 		Comment ->
  979: 		    CommentHtml = 
  980: 			"<font color=\"green\">" ++ "(" ++ "</font>"
  981: 			++ Comment ++ 
  982: 			"<font color=\"green\">" ++ ")" ++ "</font>",
  983: 		    Str = io_lib:format("~ts   ~ts", [ErrorHtml,CommentHtml]),
  984: 		    test_server:comment(Str)
  985: 	    end
  986:     end,
  987: 
  988:     PrintError = fun(ErrorFormat, ErrorArgs) ->
  989:                       Div = "\n- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - "
  990:                             "- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\n",
  991: 		       ErrorStr2 = io_lib:format(ErrorFormat, ErrorArgs),
  992:                       io:format(?def_gl, "~ts~n", [lists:concat([Div,ErrorStr2,Div])]),
  993: 		       Link =
  994: 			   "\n\n<a href=\"#end\">"
  995: 			   "Full error description and stacktrace"
  996: 			   "</a>",
  997: 		       ErrorHtml2 = ct_logs:escape_chars(ErrorStr2),
  998: 		       ct_logs:tc_log(ct_error_notify,
  999: 				      ?MAX_IMPORTANCE,
 1000: 				      "CT Error Notification",
 1001:                                       "~ts", [ErrorHtml2++Link],
 1002:                                       [])
 1003: 	       end,
 1004:     case Loc of
 1005: 	[{?MODULE,error_in_suite}] ->
 1006: 	    PrintError("Error in suite detected: ~ts", [ErrorStr]);
 1007: 
 1008: 	R when R == unknown; R == undefined ->
 1009: 	    PrintError("Error detected: ~ts", [ErrorStr]);
 1010: 
 1011: 	%% if a function specified by all/0 does not exist, we
 1012: 	%% pick up undef here
 1013: 	[{LastMod,LastFunc}|_] when ErrorStr == "undef" ->
 1014: 	    PrintError("~w:~tw could not be executed~nReason: ~ts",
 1015: 		     [LastMod,LastFunc,ErrorStr]);
 1016: 
 1017: 	[{LastMod,LastFunc}|_] ->
 1018: 	    PrintError("~w:~tw failed~nReason: ~ts", [LastMod,LastFunc,ErrorStr]);
 1019: 	    
 1020: 	[{LastMod,LastFunc,LastLine}|_] ->
 1021: 	    %% print error to console, we are only
 1022: 	    %% interested in the last executed expression
 1023: 	    PrintError("~w:~tw failed on line ~w~nReason: ~ts",
 1024: 		     [LastMod,LastFunc,LastLine,ErrorStr]),
 1025: 	    
 1026: 	    case ct_util:read_suite_data({seq,Mod,Func}) of
 1027: 		undefined ->
 1028: 		    ok;
 1029: 		Seq ->
 1030: 		    SeqTCs = ct_util:read_suite_data({seq,Mod,Seq}),
 1031: 		    mark_as_failed(Seq,Mod,Func,SeqTCs)
 1032: 	    end	    
 1033:     end,
 1034:     ok.
 1035: 
 1036: %% cases in seq that have already run
 1037: mark_as_failed(Seq,Mod,Func,[Func|TCs]) ->
 1038:     mark_as_failed1(Seq,Mod,Func,TCs);
 1039: mark_as_failed(Seq,Mod,Func,[_TC|TCs]) ->
 1040:     mark_as_failed(Seq,Mod,Func,TCs);
 1041: mark_as_failed(_,_,_,[]) ->
 1042:     ok;
 1043: mark_as_failed(_,_,_,undefined) ->
 1044:     ok.
 1045: 
 1046: %% mark rest of cases in seq to be skipped
 1047: mark_as_failed1(Seq,Mod,Func,[TC|TCs]) ->
 1048:     ct_util:save_suite_data({seq,Mod,TC},{failed,Seq,Func}),
 1049:     mark_as_failed1(Seq,Mod,Func,TCs);
 1050: mark_as_failed1(_,_,_,[]) ->
 1051:     ok.
 1052: 
 1053: group_or_func(Func, Config) when Func == init_per_group; 
 1054: 				 Func == end_per_group ->
 1055:     case ?val(tc_group_properties, Config) of
 1056: 	undefined ->
 1057: 	    {Func,unknown,[]};
 1058: 	GrProps ->
 1059: 	    GrName = ?val(name,GrProps),
 1060: 	    {Func,GrName,proplists:delete(name,GrProps)}
 1061:     end;	  
 1062: group_or_func(Func, _Config) ->
 1063:     Func.
 1064: 
 1065: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1066: %%% -spec get_suite(Mod, Func) -> Tests
 1067: %%%
 1068: %%% Called from test_server for every suite (Func==all)
 1069: %%% and every test case. If the former, all test cases in the suite
 1070: %%% should be returned.
 1071: 
 1072: get_suite(Mod, all) ->
 1073:     case safe_apply_groups_0(Mod,{ok,[]}) of
 1074:         {ok,GroupDefs} ->
 1075:             try ct_groups:find_groups(Mod, all, all, GroupDefs) of
 1076:                 ConfTests when is_list(ConfTests) ->
 1077:                     get_all(Mod, ConfTests)
 1078:             catch
 1079:                 throw:{error,Error} ->
 1080:                     [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Error}]]}];
 1081:                 _:Error:S ->
 1082:                     [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,{Error,S}}]]}]
 1083:             end;
 1084:         {error,{bad_return,_Bad}} ->
 1085: 	    E = "Bad return value from "++atom_to_list(Mod)++":groups/0",
 1086: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,list_to_atom(E)}]]}];
 1087:         {error,{bad_hook_return,Bad}} ->
 1088: 	    E = "Bad return value from post_groups/2 hook function",
 1089: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,{list_to_atom(E),Bad}}]]}];
 1090:         {error,{failed,ExitReason}} ->
 1091: 	    case ct_util:get_testdata({error_in_suite,Mod}) of
 1092: 		undefined ->
 1093: 		    ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
 1094: 					   "~w:groups/0 failed: ~p~n",
 1095: 					   [Mod,ExitReason]),
 1096: 		    io:format(?def_gl, ErrStr, []),
 1097: 		    %% save the error info so it doesn't get printed twice
 1098: 		    ct_util:set_testdata_async({{error_in_suite,Mod},
 1099: 						ExitReason});
 1100: 		_ExitReason ->
 1101: 		    ct_util:delete_testdata({error_in_suite,Mod})
 1102: 	    end,
 1103: 	    Reason = list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Mod)++":groups/0 failed"),
 1104: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Reason}]]}];
 1105:         {error,What} ->
 1106:             [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,What}]]}]
 1107:     end;
 1108: 
 1109: %%!============================================================
 1110: %%! Note: The handling of sequences in get_suite/2 and get_all/2
 1111: %%! is deprecated and should be removed at some point...
 1112: %%!============================================================
 1113: 
 1114: %% group
 1115: get_suite(Mod, Group={conf,Props,_Init,TCs,_End}) ->
 1116:     case safe_apply_groups_0(Mod,{ok,[Group]}) of
 1117:         {ok,GroupDefs} ->
 1118:             Name = ?val(name, Props),
 1119:             try ct_groups:find_groups(Mod, Name, TCs, GroupDefs) of
 1120:                 [] ->
 1121:                     [];
 1122:                 ConfTests when is_list(ConfTests) ->
 1123:                     case lists:member(skipped, Props) of
 1124:                         true ->
 1125:                             %% a *subgroup* specified *only* as skipped (and not
 1126:                             %% as an explicit test) should not be returned, or
 1127:                             %% init/end functions for top groups will be executed
 1128:                             try ?val(name, element(2, hd(ConfTests))) of
 1129:                                 Name ->		% top group
 1130:                                     ct_groups:delete_subs(ConfTests, ConfTests);
 1131:                                 _ -> []
 1132:                             catch
 1133:                                 _:_ -> []
 1134:                             end;
 1135:                         false ->
 1136:                             ConfTests1 = ct_groups:delete_subs(ConfTests,
 1137:                                                                ConfTests),
 1138:                             case ?val(override, Props) of
 1139:                                 undefined ->
 1140:                                     ConfTests1;
 1141:                                 [] ->
 1142:                                     ConfTests1;
 1143:                                 ORSpec ->
 1144:                                     ORSpec1 = if is_tuple(ORSpec) -> [ORSpec];
 1145:                                                  true -> ORSpec end,
 1146:                                     ct_groups:search_and_override(ConfTests1,
 1147:                                                                   ORSpec1, Mod)
 1148:                             end
 1149:                     end
 1150:             catch
 1151:                 throw:{error,Error} ->
 1152:                     [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Error}]]}];
 1153:                 _:Error:S ->
 1154:                     [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,{Error,S}}]]}]
 1155:             end;
 1156:         {error,{bad_return,_Bad}} ->
 1157: 	    E = "Bad return value from "++atom_to_list(Mod)++":groups/0",
 1158: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,list_to_atom(E)}]]}];
 1159:         {error,{bad_hook_return,Bad}} ->
 1160:             E = "Bad return value from post_groups/2 hook function",
 1161: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,{list_to_atom(E),Bad}}]]}];
 1162:         {error,{failed,ExitReason}} ->
 1163: 	    case ct_util:get_testdata({error_in_suite,Mod}) of
 1164: 		undefined ->
 1165: 		    ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
 1166: 					   "~w:groups/0 failed: ~p~n",
 1167: 					   [Mod,ExitReason]),
 1168: 		    io:format(?def_gl, ErrStr, []),
 1169: 		    %% save the error info so it doesn't get printed twice
 1170: 		    ct_util:set_testdata_async({{error_in_suite,Mod},
 1171: 						ExitReason});
 1172: 		_ExitReason ->
 1173: 		    ct_util:delete_testdata({error_in_suite,Mod})
 1174: 	    end,
 1175: 	    Reason = list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Mod)++":groups/0 failed"),
 1176: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Reason}]]}];
 1177:          {error,What} ->
 1178:             [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,What}]]}]
 1179:     end;
 1180: 
 1181: %% testcase
 1182: get_suite(Mod, Name) ->
 1183:     get_seq(Mod, Name).
 1184: 
 1185: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1186: 
 1187: get_all_cases(Suite) ->
 1188:     case get_suite(Suite, all) of
 1189: 	[{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,_}=Error]]}] ->
 1190: 		Error;
 1191: 	[{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[Error]]}] ->
 1192: 	    {error,Error};
 1193: 	Tests ->
 1194: 	    Cases = get_all_cases1(Suite, Tests),
 1195: 	    ?rev(lists:foldl(fun(TC, TCs) ->
 1196: 				     case lists:member(TC, TCs) of
 1197: 				      true  -> TCs;
 1198: 					 false -> [TC | TCs]
 1199: 				     end
 1200: 			     end, [], Cases))
 1201:     end.
 1202: 
 1203: get_all_cases1(Suite, [{conf,_Props,_Init,GrTests,_End} | Tests]) ->
 1204:     get_all_cases1(Suite, GrTests) ++ get_all_cases1(Suite, Tests);
 1205: 
 1206: get_all_cases1(Suite, [Test | Tests]) when is_atom(Test) ->
 1207:     [{Suite,Test} | get_all_cases1(Suite, Tests)];
 1208: 
 1209: get_all_cases1(Suite, [Test | Tests]) ->
 1210:     [Test | get_all_cases1(Suite, Tests)];
 1211: 
 1212: get_all_cases1(_, []) ->
 1213:     [].
 1214: 
 1215: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1216: 
 1217: get_all(Mod, ConfTests) ->
 1218:     case safe_apply_all_0(Mod) of
 1219:         {ok,AllTCs} ->
 1220:             %% expand group references using ConfTests
 1221:             try ct_groups:expand_groups(AllTCs, ConfTests, Mod) of
 1222:                 {error,_} = Error ->
 1223:                     [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[Error]]}];
 1224:                 Tests0 ->
 1225:                     Tests = ct_groups:delete_subs(Tests0, Tests0),
 1226:                     expand_tests(Mod, Tests)
 1227:             catch
 1228:                 throw:{error,Error} ->
 1229:                     [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Error},{force_failed,true}]]}];
 1230:                 _:Error:S ->
 1231:                     [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,{Error,S}},{force_failed,true}]]}]
 1232:             end;
 1233:         Skip = {skip,_Reason} ->
 1234: 	    Skip;
 1235:         {error,undef} ->
 1236:             Reason =
 1237:                 case code:which(Mod) of
 1238:                     non_existing ->
 1239:                         list_to_atom(
 1240:                           atom_to_list(Mod)++
 1241:                               " cannot be compiled or loaded");
 1242:                     _ ->
 1243:                         list_to_atom(
 1244:                           atom_to_list(Mod)++":all/0 is missing")
 1245:                 end,
 1246:             %% this makes test_server call error_in_suite as first
 1247:             %% (and only) test case so we can report Reason properly
 1248:             [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Reason}]]}];
 1249: 	{error,{bad_return,_Bad}} ->
 1250: 	    Reason =
 1251: 		list_to_atom("Bad return value from "++
 1252: 				 atom_to_list(Mod)++":all/0"),
 1253: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Reason}]]}];
 1254:         {error,{bad_hook_return,Bad}} ->
 1255: 	    Reason =
 1256: 		list_to_atom("Bad return value from post_all/3 hook function"),
 1257: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,{Reason,Bad}}]]}];
 1258:         {error,{failed,ExitReason}} ->
 1259: 	    case ct_util:get_testdata({error_in_suite,Mod}) of
 1260: 		undefined ->
 1261: 		    ErrStr = io_lib:format("~n*** ERROR *** "
 1262: 					   "~w:all/0 failed: ~tp~n",
 1263: 					   [Mod,ExitReason]),
 1264: 		    io:format(?def_gl, "~ts", [ErrStr]),
 1265: 		    %% save the error info so it doesn't get printed twice
 1266: 		    ct_util:set_testdata_async({{error_in_suite,Mod},
 1267: 						ExitReason});
 1268: 		_ExitReason ->
 1269: 		    ct_util:delete_testdata({error_in_suite,Mod})
 1270: 	    end,
 1271: 	    Reason = list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Mod)++":all/0 failed"),
 1272: 	    %% this makes test_server call error_in_suite as first
 1273: 	    %% (and only) test case so we can report Reason properly
 1274: 	    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,Reason}]]}];
 1275:         {error,What} ->
 1276:             [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,What}]]}]
 1277:     end.
 1278: 
 1279: %%!============================================================
 1280: %%! The support for sequences by means of using sequences/0
 1281: %%! will be removed in OTP R15. The code below is only kept 
 1282: %%! for backwards compatibility. From OTP R13 groups with
 1283: %%! sequence property should be used instead!
 1284: %%!============================================================
 1285: %%!============================================================
 1286: %%! START OF DEPRECATED SUPPORT FOR SEQUENCES --->
 1287: 
 1288: get_seq(Mod, Func) ->
 1289:     case ct_util:read_suite_data({seq,Mod,Func}) of
 1290: 	undefined ->
 1291: 	    case catch apply(Mod,sequences,[]) of
 1292: 		{'EXIT',_} ->
 1293: 		    [];
 1294: 		Seqs ->
 1295: 		    case lists:keysearch(Func,1,Seqs) of
 1296: 			{value,{Func,SeqTCs}} ->			    
 1297: 			    case catch save_seq(Mod,Func,SeqTCs) of
 1298: 				{error,What} ->
 1299: 				    [{?MODULE,error_in_suite,[[{error,What}]]}];
 1300: 				_ ->
 1301: 				    SeqTCs
 1302: 			    end;
 1303: 			false ->
 1304: 			    []
 1305: 		    end
 1306: 	    end;
 1307: 	TCs when is_list(TCs) ->
 1308: 	    TCs;
 1309: 	_ ->
 1310: 	    []
 1311:     end.
 1312: 
 1313: save_seqs(Mod,AllTCs) ->
 1314:     case lists:keymember(sequence,1,AllTCs) of
 1315: 	true ->
 1316: 	    case catch apply(Mod,sequences,[]) of
 1317: 		{'EXIT',_} -> 
 1318: 		    Reason = list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Mod)++
 1319: 					  ":sequences/0 is missing"),
 1320: 		    throw({error,Reason});
 1321: 		Seqs ->
 1322: 		    save_seqs(Mod,AllTCs,Seqs,AllTCs)
 1323: 	    end;
 1324: 	false ->
 1325: 	    AllTCs
 1326:     end.
 1327:     
 1328: save_seqs(Mod,[{sequence,Seq}|TCs],Seqs,All) ->
 1329:     case lists:keysearch(Seq,1,Seqs) of
 1330: 	{value,{Seq,SeqTCs}} ->
 1331: 	    save_seq(Mod,Seq,SeqTCs,All),
 1332: 	    [Seq|save_seqs(Mod,TCs,Seqs,All)];
 1333: 	false ->
 1334: 	    Reason = list_to_atom(
 1335: 		       atom_to_list(Seq)++" is missing in "++
 1336: 		       atom_to_list(Mod)),
 1337: 	    throw({error,Reason})
 1338:     end;
 1339: save_seqs(Mod,[TC|TCs],Seqs,All) ->
 1340:     [TC|save_seqs(Mod,TCs,Seqs,All)];
 1341: save_seqs(_,[],_,_) ->
 1342:     [].
 1343: 
 1344: save_seq(Mod,Seq,SeqTCs) ->
 1345:     save_seq(Mod,Seq,SeqTCs,apply(Mod,all,[])).
 1346:     
 1347: save_seq(Mod,Seq,SeqTCs,All) ->
 1348:     check_private(Seq,SeqTCs,All),
 1349:     check_multiple(Mod,Seq,SeqTCs),
 1350:     ct_util:save_suite_data({seq,Mod,Seq},SeqTCs),
 1351:     lists:foreach(fun(TC) -> 
 1352: 			  ct_util:save_suite_data({seq,Mod,TC},Seq)
 1353: 		  end, SeqTCs).
 1354: 
 1355: check_private(Seq,TCs,All) ->    
 1356:     Bad = lists:filter(fun(TC) -> lists:member(TC,All) end, TCs),
 1357:     if Bad /= [] ->
 1358: 	    Reason = io_lib:format("regular test cases not allowed in sequence ~tp: "
 1359: 				   "~tp",[Seq,Bad]),
 1360: 	    throw({error,list_to_atom(lists:flatten(Reason))});
 1361:        true ->
 1362: 	    ok
 1363:     end.
 1364: 
 1365: check_multiple(Mod,Seq,TCs) ->
 1366:     Bad = lists:filter(fun(TC) ->
 1367: 			       case ct_util:read_suite_data({seq,Mod,TC}) of
 1368: 				   Seq1 when Seq1 /= undefined, Seq1 /= Seq -> 
 1369: 				       true;
 1370: 
 1371: 				   _ -> false
 1372: 			       end
 1373: 		       end,TCs),
 1374:     if Bad /= [] ->
 1375: 	    Reason = io_lib:format("test cases found in multiple sequences: "
 1376: 				   "~tp",[Bad]),
 1377: 	    throw({error,list_to_atom(lists:flatten(Reason))});
 1378:        true ->
 1379: 	    ok
 1380:     end.
 1381: 
 1382: %%! <---  END OF DEPRECATED SUPPORT FOR SEQUENCES
 1383: %%!============================================================
 1384: 
 1385: %% let test_server call this function as a testcase only so that
 1386: %% the user may see info about what's missing in the suite
 1387: error_in_suite(Config) ->
 1388:     Reason = test_server:lookup_config(error,Config),
 1389:     exit(Reason).
 1390: 
 1391: %% if init_per_suite and end_per_suite are missing in the suite,
 1392: %% these will be called instead (without any trace of them in the
 1393: %% log files), only so that it's possible to call hook functions
 1394: %% for configuration
 1395: init_per_suite(Config) ->
 1396:     Config.
 1397: 
 1398: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
 1399:     ok.
 1400: 
 1401: %% if the group config functions are missing in the suite,
 1402: %% use these instead
 1403: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
 1404:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("start of ~tp", [GroupName])),
 1405:     ct_logs:log("TEST INFO", "init_per_group/2 for ~tw missing "
 1406: 		"in suite, using default.",
 1407: 		[GroupName]),
 1408:     Config.
 1409: 
 1410: end_per_group(GroupName, _) ->
 1411:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("end of ~tp", [GroupName])),
 1412:     ct_logs:log("TEST INFO", "end_per_group/2 for ~tw missing "
 1413: 		"in suite, using default.",
 1414: 		[GroupName]),
 1415:     ok.
 1416:     
 1417: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1418: %%% -spec report(What,Data) -> ok
 1419: report(What,Data) ->
 1420:     case What of
 1421: 	loginfo ->
 1422: 	    %% logfiles and directories have been created for a test and the
 1423: 	    %% top level test index page needs to be refreshed
 1424: 	    TestName = filename:basename(?val(topdir, Data), ".logs"),
 1425: 	    RunDir = ?val(rundir, Data),
 1426: 	    _ = ct_logs:make_all_suites_index({TestName,RunDir},unknown),
 1427: 	    ok;
 1428: 	tests_start ->
 1429: 	    ok;
 1430: 	tests_done ->
 1431: 	    ok;
 1432: 	severe_error ->
 1433: 	    ct_event:sync_notify(#event{name=What,
 1434: 					node=node(),
 1435: 					data=Data}),
 1436: 	    ct_util:set_testdata({What,Data}),
 1437: 	    ok;
 1438: 	tc_start ->
 1439: 	    %% Data = {{Suite,{Func,GroupName}},LogFileName}
 1440: 	    Data1 = case Data of
 1441: 			{{Suite,{Func,undefined}},LFN} -> {{Suite,Func},LFN};
 1442: 			_ -> Data
 1443: 		    end,
 1444: 	    ct_event:sync_notify(#event{name=tc_logfile,
 1445: 					node=node(),
 1446: 					data=Data1}),
 1447: 	    ok;
 1448: 	tc_done ->
 1449: 	    {Suite,{Func,GrName},Result} = Data,
 1450:             FuncSpec = if GrName == undefined -> Func;
 1451:                           true                -> {Func,GrName}
 1452:                        end,
 1453: 	    %% Register the group leader for the process calling the report
 1454: 	    %% function, making it possible for a hook function to print
 1455: 	    %% in the test case log file
 1456: 	    ReportingPid = self(),
 1457: 	    ct_logs:register_groupleader(ReportingPid, group_leader()),
 1458: 	    case Result of
 1459: 		{failed, Reason} ->
 1460: 		    ct_hooks:on_tc_fail(What, {Suite,FuncSpec,Reason});
 1461: 		{skipped,{failed,{_,init_per_testcase,_}}=Reason} ->
 1462: 		    ct_hooks:on_tc_skip(tc_auto_skip,  {Suite,FuncSpec,Reason});
 1463: 		{skipped,{require_failed,_}=Reason} ->
 1464: 		    ct_hooks:on_tc_skip(tc_auto_skip, {Suite,FuncSpec,Reason});
 1465: 		{skipped,Reason} ->
 1466: 		    ct_hooks:on_tc_skip(tc_user_skip, {Suite,FuncSpec,Reason});
 1467: 		{auto_skipped,Reason} ->
 1468: 		    ct_hooks:on_tc_skip(tc_auto_skip, {Suite,FuncSpec,Reason});
 1469: 		_Else ->
 1470: 		    ok
 1471: 	    end,
 1472: 	    ct_logs:unregister_groupleader(ReportingPid),
 1473: 	    case {Func,Result} of
 1474: 		{error_in_suite,_} when Suite == ?MODULE ->
 1475: 		    ok;
 1476: 		{init_per_suite,_} ->
 1477: 		    ok;
 1478: 		{end_per_suite,_} ->
 1479: 		    ok;
 1480: 		{init_per_group,_} ->
 1481: 		    ok;
 1482: 		{end_per_group,_} ->
 1483: 		    ok;
 1484: 		{_,ok} ->
 1485: 		    add_to_stats(ok);
 1486: 		{_,{skipped,{failed,{_,init_per_testcase,_}}}} ->
 1487: 		    add_to_stats(auto_skipped);
 1488: 		{_,{skipped,{require_failed,_}}} ->
 1489: 		    add_to_stats(auto_skipped);
 1490: 		{_,{skipped,{timetrap_error,_}}} ->
 1491: 		    add_to_stats(auto_skipped);
 1492: 		{_,{skipped,{invalid_time_format,_}}} ->
 1493: 		    add_to_stats(auto_skipped);
 1494: 		{_,{skipped,_}} ->
 1495: 		    add_to_stats(user_skipped);
 1496: 		{_,{auto_skipped,_}} ->
 1497: 		    add_to_stats(auto_skipped);
 1498: 		{_,{SkipOrFail,_Reason}} ->
 1499: 		    add_to_stats(SkipOrFail)
 1500: 	    end;
 1501: 	tc_user_skip ->
 1502: 	    %% test case or config function specified as skipped in testspec,
 1503: 	    %% or init config func for suite/group has returned {skip,Reason}
 1504: 	    %% Data = {Suite,{Func,GroupName},Comment}
 1505: 	    {Func,Data1} = case Data of
 1506: 			       {Suite,{F,undefined},Comment} ->
 1507: 				   {F,{Suite,F,Comment}};
 1508: 			       D = {_,{F,_},_} ->
 1509: 				   {F,D}
 1510: 			   end,
 1511: 	    ct_event:sync_notify(#event{name=tc_user_skip,
 1512: 					node=node(),
 1513: 					data=Data1}),
 1514: 	    ct_hooks:on_tc_skip(What, Data1),
 1515: 	    if Func /= init_per_suite, Func /= init_per_group,
 1516: 	       Func /= end_per_suite, Func /= end_per_group ->
 1517: 		    add_to_stats(user_skipped);
 1518: 	       true ->
 1519: 		    ok
 1520: 	    end;
 1521: 	tc_auto_skip ->
 1522: 	    %% test case skipped because of error in config function, or
 1523: 	    %% config function skipped because of error in info function
 1524: 	    %% Data = {Suite,{Func,GroupName},Comment}
 1525: 	    {Func,Data1} = case Data of
 1526: 			       {Suite,{F,undefined},Comment} ->
 1527: 				   {F,{Suite,F,Comment}};
 1528: 			       D = {_,{F,_},_} ->
 1529: 				   {F,D}
 1530: 			   end,
 1531: 	    %% this test case does not have a log, so printouts
 1532: 	    %% from event handlers should end up in the main log
 1533: 	    ct_event:sync_notify(#event{name=tc_auto_skip,
 1534: 					node=node(),
 1535: 					data=Data1}),
 1536: 	    ct_hooks:on_tc_skip(What, Data1),
 1537: 	    if Func /= end_per_suite, 
 1538: 	       Func /= end_per_group ->
 1539: 		    add_to_stats(auto_skipped);
 1540: 	       true -> 
 1541: 		    ok
 1542: 	    end;
 1543: 	framework_error ->
 1544: 	    case Data of
 1545: 		{{M,F},E} ->
 1546: 		    ct_event:sync_notify(#event{name=tc_done,
 1547: 						node=node(),
 1548: 						data={M,F,{framework_error,E}}});
 1549: 		_ ->
 1550: 		    ct_event:sync_notify(#event{name=tc_done,
 1551: 						node=node(),
 1552: 						data=Data})
 1553: 	    end;
 1554: 	_ ->
 1555: 	    ok
 1556:     end.
 1557: 
 1558: add_to_stats(Result) ->
 1559:     Update = fun({Ok,Failed,Skipped={UserSkipped,AutoSkipped}}) ->
 1560: 		     Stats =
 1561: 			 case Result of
 1562: 			     ok ->
 1563: 				 {Ok+1,Failed,Skipped};
 1564: 			     failed ->
 1565: 				 {Ok,Failed+1,Skipped};
 1566: 			     skipped ->
 1567: 				 {Ok,Failed,{UserSkipped+1,AutoSkipped}};
 1568: 			     user_skipped ->
 1569: 				 {Ok,Failed,{UserSkipped+1,AutoSkipped}};
 1570: 			     auto_skipped ->
 1571: 				 {Ok,Failed,{UserSkipped,AutoSkipped+1}}
 1572: 			 end,
 1573: 		     ct_event:sync_notify(#event{name=test_stats,
 1574: 						 node=node(),
 1575: 						 data=Stats}),
 1576: 		     Stats
 1577: 	     end,
 1578:     ct_util:update_testdata(stats, Update).
 1579: 
 1580: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1581: %%% -spec warn(What) -> true | false
 1582: warn(What) when What==nodes; What==processes ->
 1583:     false;
 1584: warn(_What) ->
 1585:     true.
 1586: 
 1587: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1588: %%% -spec add_data_dir(File0, Config) -> File1
 1589: add_data_dir(File,Config) when is_atom(File) ->
 1590:     add_data_dir(atom_to_list(File),Config);
 1591: 
 1592: add_data_dir(File,Config) when is_list(File) ->
 1593:     case filename:split(File) of
 1594: 	[File] ->
 1595: 	    %% no user path, add data dir
 1596: 	    case lists:keysearch(data_dir,1,Config) of
 1597: 		{value,{data_dir,DataDir}} ->
 1598: 		    filename:join(DataDir,File);
 1599: 		_ ->
 1600: 		    File
 1601: 	    end;
 1602: 	_ ->
 1603: 	    File
 1604:     end.
 1605: 
 1606: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1607: %%% -spec get_logopts() -> [LogOpt]
 1608: get_logopts() ->
 1609:     case ct_util:get_testdata(logopts) of
 1610: 	undefined ->
 1611: 	    [];
 1612: 	LogOpts ->
 1613: 	    LogOpts
 1614:     end.
 1615: 
 1616: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1617: %%% -spec format_comment(Comment) -> HtmlComment
 1618: format_comment(Comment) ->
 1619:     "<font color=\"green\">" ++ Comment ++ "</font>".
 1620: 
 1621: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1622: %%% -spec get_html_wrapper(TestName, PrintLabel, Cwd) -> Header
 1623: get_html_wrapper(TestName, PrintLabel, Cwd, TableCols) ->
 1624:     get_html_wrapper(TestName, PrintLabel, Cwd, TableCols, utf8).
 1625: 
 1626: get_html_wrapper(TestName, PrintLabel, Cwd, TableCols, Encoding) ->
 1627:     ct_logs:get_ts_html_wrapper(TestName, PrintLabel, Cwd, TableCols, Encoding).
 1628: 
 1629: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1630: %%% -spec get_log_dir() -> {ok,LogDir}
 1631: get_log_dir() ->
 1632:     ct_logs:get_log_dir(true).
 1633: 
 1634: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1635: %%% Call all and group callbacks and post_* hooks with error handling
 1636: safe_apply_all_0(Mod) ->
 1637:     try apply(Mod, all, []) of
 1638:         AllTCs0 when is_list(AllTCs0) ->
 1639: 	    try save_seqs(Mod,AllTCs0) of
 1640: 		SeqsAndTCs when is_list(SeqsAndTCs) ->
 1641:                     all_hook(Mod,SeqsAndTCs)
 1642:             catch throw:{error,What} ->
 1643: 		    {error,What}
 1644:             end;
 1645:         {skip,_}=Skip ->
 1646:             all_hook(Mod,Skip);
 1647:         Bad ->
 1648:             {error,{bad_return,Bad}}
 1649:     catch
 1650:         _:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 1651:             handle_callback_crash(Reason,Stacktrace,Mod,all,{error,undef})
 1652:     end.
 1653: 
 1654: all_hook(Mod, All) ->
 1655:     case ct_hooks:all(Mod, All) of
 1656:         AllTCs when is_list(AllTCs) ->
 1657:             {ok,AllTCs};
 1658:         {skip,_}=Skip ->
 1659:             Skip;
 1660:         {fail,Reason} ->
 1661:             {error,Reason};
 1662:         Bad ->
 1663:             {error,{bad_hook_return,Bad}}
 1664:     end.
 1665: 
 1666: safe_apply_groups_0(Mod,Default) ->
 1667:     try apply(Mod, groups, []) of
 1668:         GroupDefs when is_list(GroupDefs) ->
 1669:             case ct_hooks:groups(Mod, GroupDefs) of
 1670:                 GroupDefs1 when is_list(GroupDefs1) ->
 1671:                     {ok,GroupDefs1};
 1672:                 {fail,Reason} ->
 1673:                     {error,Reason};
 1674:                 Bad ->
 1675:                     {error,{bad_hook_return,Bad}}
 1676:             end;
 1677:         Bad ->
 1678:             {error,{bad_return,Bad}}
 1679:     catch
 1680:         _:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 1681:             handle_callback_crash(Reason,Stacktrace,Mod,groups,Default)
 1682:     end.
 1683: 
 1684: handle_callback_crash(undef,[{Mod,Func,[],_}|_],Mod,Func,Default) ->
 1685:     case ct_hooks:Func(Mod, []) of
 1686:         [] ->
 1687:             Default;
 1688:         List when is_list(List) ->
 1689:             {ok,List};
 1690:         {fail,Reason} ->
 1691:             {error,Reason};
 1692:         Bad ->
 1693:             {error,{bad_hook_return,Bad}}
 1694:     end;
 1695: handle_callback_crash(Reason,Stacktrace,_Mod,_Func,_Default) ->
 1696:     {error,{failed,{Reason,Stacktrace}}}.
 1697: 
 1698: expand_tests(Mod, [{testcase,Case,[Prop]}|Tests]) ->
 1699:     [{repeat,{Mod,Case},Prop}|expand_tests(Mod,Tests)];
 1700: expand_tests(Mod,[Test|Tests]) ->
 1701:     [Test|expand_tests(Mod,Tests)];
 1702: expand_tests(_Mod,[]) ->
 1703:     [].
